articles.description: American gymnast Jordan Chiles has been stripped of the bronze medal she won in the women's floor final after a ruling by the Court of Arbitration for Sport.
articles.title: Jordan Chiles: Gymnast loses Olympic bronze in score dispute

articles.description: Imane Khelif and Lin Yu-ting each won gold in boxing at Paris 2024 - but the row over their eligibility looks set to continue.
articles.title: Imane Khelif and Lin Yu-ting: Boxing eligibility row key questions

articles.description: Emma Finucane makes British Olympic history by winning individual sprint bronze for her third medal of the Paris Games.
articles.title: Olympics track cycling: Emma Finucane wins third medal of Paris 2024

articles.description: Emily Campbell claims Great Britain's final medal of the Paris Olympics with bronze in the women's +81kg weightlifting.
articles.title: Olympic weightlifting: Emily Campbell wins women's +81kg bronze for Great Britain

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: The Paris Olympics will officially end with the closing ceremony on Sunday.
articles.title: Paris Olympics Closing Ceremony: Date, time, who is performing and how to watch on the BBC

articles.description: The United States snatch top spot in the 2024 Olympic medal table as their women's basketball team beat hosts France to win the final gold on offer in Paris.
articles.title: Olympic basketball: USA top Paris medal table after dramatic women's win against France

articles.description: The man was arrested for scaling the Paris icon hours before the Olympics closing ceremony.
articles.title: Man arrested for climbing Eiffel Tower

articles.description: Graeme McDowell is suspended by LIV Golf for one tournament for violating the circuit's anti-doping policy.
articles.title: Graeme McDowell suspended by LIV Golf for anti-doping offence

articles.description: Manchester United are hopeful of tying captain Bruno Fernandes down to a new long-term deal.
articles.title: Bruno Fernandes: Manchester United hopeful midfielder will sign new contract
